arts.ttl: World media reacts as Rangers ride 'Scottish waves' to leave Nice shipwrecked while penalty snub sparks French outrage
arts.sum: The Light Blues rout of the Ligue 1 side in the Europa League has gone global

arts.ttl: Has Igamane announced himself as Rangers' main man?
arts.sum: With his two-goal performance against Nice, has Hamza Igamane pushed himself to the front of the queue to start up front for Rangers?

arts.ttl: Europa League roundup: Igamane fires Rangers to stunning win in Nice
arts.sum: Moroccan striker scores twice in emphatic 4-1 victory Athletic Bilbao and Eintracht Frankfurt win; Lazio draw Philippe Clement again found sanctuary in Europe as Rangers romped to a remarkable 4-1 win over Nice in France. Amid domestic struggles which have piled pressure on the Belgian boss, his side again came up with the goods this season in the Europa League. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | OGC Nice 1-4 Rangers: Le Gym’s Europa League hopes hang by a thread
arts.sum: UEFA Europa League, Matchday 5, 28/11/24 It was a nightmare evening for OGC Nice, who in defeat to Glasgow Rangers (1-4), leave their UEFA Europa League hopes hanging by a…

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement tells Cyriel Dessers to up his game as Rangers boss sends out message
arts.sum: Clement further added that Igamane deserved his chance in the team thanks to the work that he has put in in training, with the Belgian stating that the young Moroccan has improved even over the past fortnight. Get the latest news sent straight to your messages by joining our Rangers WhatsApp community today.

arts.ttl: Kris Boyd astounded by Rangers Euro heroics as he says exactly what Philippe Clement will be thinking
arts.sum: "To go away from home in Europe, score four goals, should have been more, they'll be absolutely delighted and you know, Philippe Clement will probably just be sitting there thinking to himself why can't I get this level of performance at home, domestically away from home and at Ibrox because it just seems like two different teams. Boyd reckons his former side deserve "a lot of credit" for their win, but admits the side are currently performing like "two different teams" when it comes to domestic and European football.

arts.ttl: Kris Boyd turns Rangers spoiler for Europa League party as trademark smirk fades before Philippe Clement inquiry
arts.sum: Nice were thumped but it wasn't all smiles from the Ibrox hero

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement fires warning to Rangers stars after Nice euphoria as Dessers sent message over Igamane battle
arts.sum: The Belgian reflected on a huge victory in France and wants it to be a springboard for domestic success

arts.ttl: Rangers pundits stunned by 'infectious' Hamza Igamane as former stars unite over skyrocketing Ibrox career
arts.sum: It's been a stunning night for Rangers in the Europa League once again as they hit the French outfit for FOUR on the road

arts.ttl: Rangers thrash Nice to ease pressure on Clement
arts.sum: Hamza Igamane starred as Rangers cruised to a 4-1 win in Nice to ease the pressure on under-siege manager Philippe Clement and boost their chances of progressing to the knockout phase of the Europa League.
